sentences.en: ...air pollution, traffic congestion, and the steady degradation of our quality of life.
sentences.cn: …空气污染、交通阻塞以及我们生活质量的持续恶化。

sentences.en: a life of poverty and degradation
Another pathway of organophosphate degradation involves reduction.
sentences.cn: 有机磷酸盐降解的其它途径还包括还原作用.

sentences.en: Degradation is accelerated following leaf detachment.
Heathcliff bore his degradation pretty well at first, because Cathy taught him what she learnt, and worked or played with him in the fields.
sentences.cn: 起初这孩子还很能忍受他的降级，因为凯蒂把她所学的都教给他，还陪他在地里干活或玩耍。

sentences.en: In many instances, such bed degradation is beneficial.
sentences.cn: 在许多情况下, 这种河床冲刷是有利的.

sentences.en: In stock yards ammonia is formed by biological degradation.
sentences.cn: 在畜牧场,氨是由生物降解形成的.

sentences.en: It may progressively remove the constraints on degradation discussed earlier.
sentences.cn: 这样可逐渐除去前面讨论过的对降解的抑制.

sentences.en: Microbial degradation critically affects the fate and behavior of pesticides in soil.
sentences.cn: 生物降解主要影响土壤中农药的行为和命运.

sentences.en: Slow degradation of ground water quality may result from repeated use.
sentences.cn: 循环使用地下水可以导致缓慢的水质降低.

sentences.en: Such energy transformation is also known as energy degradation.
sentences.cn: 这样的能量转化也被看作能量衰减.

sentences.en: the degradation of being sent to prison
sentences.cn: 被关进监狱的落泊境况

sentences.en: The only serious stress is laid upon the degradation of Tahiti.
sentences.cn: 唯一严肃的地方是把塔希提岛奚落了一番.

sentences.en: The role of dopants and contaminants in degradation cannot be ignored.
sentences.cn: 杂质和污染对退化的作用不能忽视.

sentences.en: There are serious problems of land degradation in some arid zones.
sentences.cn: 在一些干旱地带存在严重的土地退化问题。

sentences.en: Therefore probably some slow intralysosomal degradation of endogenous enzymes occurs.
sentences.cn: 内源酶可能发生某种低的溶酶体内的降解.

sentences.en: They were sickened by the scenes of misery and degradation they found.
sentences.cn: 目睹困苦、潦倒的景象，他们感到心里极不舒服。

sentences.en: This type of degradation is also called depolymerization.
sentences.cn: 这类降解也可称作解聚合.

words.tran_cn: 退化的；堕落的；被降级的
可耻的；丧失体面的；不名誉的
分解（degrade的过去分词）；降低…的身份；削减
退化（degrade的ing形式）；减少；降低…的身份
贬低；使……丢脸；使……降级；使……降解
[生物]退化；降格，[电子]降级；堕落

phrases.tran_cn: 环境退化；环境质量下降

trans.tran_cn: 堕落，落魄，恶化，衰退，降解
trans.tran_en: the process by which something changes to a worse condition
